1.content:
Emma: A 12-year-old girl, newly arrived at the institute. She's a redheaded girl, no curves, and she's a good girl in the classroom. The ring will be found at the school.

Olivia: 17 year old girl, during a beach party she finds a ring. She's normal height, blond hair, B-cup breasts and a very envied ass. She is one of the cheerleaders of her high school and one of the most desired girls. Her grades are fair but she passes.


Ava: She is 25 years old, currently 4 months pregnant, her breasts during pregnancy have already grown to size D.
1.title: Choose a girl

11.content:
Emma finished the day's classes, took her things from her locker and headed for the exit door when a friend of hers called her from inside the school. It was Susana, a 13-year-old girl, blonde, quite tall and developed for her age, with C-sized breasts that caught the attention of all her classmates, quite slim and not particularly smart.

Susana approached Emma showing her something she had in her hands. They were rings of various different colours. "I found them lying in the street," Susana said maliciously. Emma's attention was drawn to those bright, colorful rings. Emma took a golden one that Shala was wearing and put it on her right hand, she looked at it and saw how beautiful it was. "You can keep it," said Susana.

They said goodbye and went their separate ways. Emma went out the door and walked to the bus stop. She kept looking at her new ring, as it was on her hand and trying to make it visible to everyone.

Something had happened during the day because the bus was taking longer than usual to arrive. While she was sitting at the bus stop, someone approached Emma. It was...
11.title: Emma

114.content:
Emma was waiting for the school bus when the math teacher sat next to her, a woman in her thirties with very long dark hair and a small pregnant belly. They were talking about class stuff for a couple of minutes, then the teacher's pregnancy was discussed. The teacher was almost 4 months pregnant, however with the summer clothes you could see completely the little vulto. Before Emma's bus arrived, Emma remembered the pregnancy of her 20-year-old sister, who is currently 9 months pregnant and has become very large, she wondered if the teacher would become as large as she is. They said goodbye, giving each other two kisses.

Emma began to feel bad, her steps became heavy and her body felt uncomfortable. She looked for her place in the bus and sat down, but when she sat down, she found it more difficult than usual, she felt overwhelmed, with little space and she had discomfort in different parts of her body such as her chest, hips or ass. As she sat down and looked out the window she noticed that the teacher didn't look pregnant now and Emma thought it might be the light, the glass or some other optical effect.

After a while, Emma's uneasiness did not improve, and she explored her body with her hands, quickly got a surprise, looked and something had happened under the school uniform. Her breasts were sensitive because a size A had appeared, at least on some breasts, however Emma was totally flat until then, and that made her feel like she could explode at any moment. So did her belly, her hips, and her ass. Her ass had grown and her hips had become a little wider to make way for her belly, a pregnant belly, the size of that belly was perfectly a 4-5 month pregnant belly.

Emma arrived at her stop, she was confused. She gets off the bus and...
114.title: A teacher

choices: Looking for a way to get Chloe pregnant again
Keeping the pregnancy as it is
1142.content:
Emma walked into the house and went straight to her big sister Chloe's room. Emma wanted to talk about the pregnancy, she didn't understand anything that was happening to her body, so she decided to go to the other person in the same condition as she did.

Chloe was trying on an old bikini from before she got pregnant. She used to have a B-cup and now she has an E-cup, so the bikini is very small and the breast protrudes above and below the bikini significantly. Her sister is days away from 9 months of pregnancy, yet she looked like she was about 8 months pregnant with twins.

"How's your baby doing?" Chloe asked Emma. "Is this normal?" Emma replied.
Chloe: Of course, you're pregnant. Can I touch your belly?

Emma unbuttoned her uniform shirt so Chloe could put her hand on her belly. With Chloe's hand on Emma's belly, Emma looked at her belly and could see how it was slowly growing in the same way as her breasts were growing. Panic took over her body, she didn't understand anything. When her belly stopped growing, Emma had to take it underneath because of its size, her breasts and belly had become much bigger than Chloe's, the shirt could no longer hide anything from all that expansion. Emma thought her body was going to explode, her chest and belly had taken on a size that felt all her skin stretched to the limit, it was quite unbearable.

Emma, surprised that Chloe hadn't reacted, noticed that Chloe was wearing her bikini again and looked down to see that Chloe was no longer pregnant. Emma was smart and her brain was wide awake at that moment. "I have absorbed my sister's womb. So I've abused the teacher's womb before? but why do I look so much bigger? Maybe... because I'm smaller and thinner and it looks like the same size in my body is much bigger..." Emma began to think.
1142.title: Talk to her sister.

14.content:
Wearing the ring on the right hand will allow the person touched to transfer the pregnancy to the person with the ring; wearing the ring on the left hand will cause the ring bearer to pass the pregnancy to the person touched.

There is no limit to the number of babies, but please keep it realistic.

I will be adding the new rules as the story progresses and you and I will be creating new rules.
You can create new rings just by continuing this thread of rules.
14.title: Ring Rules

info.brief_description: You find a ring with uncontrollable powers of pregnancy as she absorbs any pregnancy.
info.description: The girl you select will find a ring that gives her uncontrollable powers of pregnancy as she absorbs any pregnancy she sees.
